activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10474
activity.text:
Hello,
I am Pranav, a computer science undergrad. I would like to work on extending CARE's support for FHIR Immunization and ensuring smooth data management. I have majorly worked on the tech stack  required to contribute to this project of which I have very good command over backend API development & building user interfaces . 

Please provide me with opportunity to contribute to this project by assigning this issue!
